attributes.action: More Support for People with Mental Health Conditions
attributes.additional_details:
1 in 4 people will experience a mental health problem in any given year.

People need to be made aware of the affect mental health conditions can have on people especially the younger population by educating them using advertisements like posters, the television etc.

Mental health conditions can be very serious and i believe the government should do more to support people and bring out the best in them not leave them in a psychiatric wards for many weeks or even months.
